name: 1st Prize Helps Retro's Basics Android Edition
name_original: 1st Prize Helps Retro's Basics Android Edition
description:
1st Prize Helps Retro's Basics Android Edition is a game developed by DMZ Basics. It was originally released in 2022.
1st Prize Helps Retro's Basics Android Edition is available on Android. You can purchase the game on itch.io.
